trigger: Isolation of primary human <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + T cells .
Isolation of primary human CD4 + T cells .

<extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + T cells were isolated from cryopreserved healthy donor PBMCs by negative selection with the <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + T Cell Isolation Kit II ( Miltenyi Biotech , Bergisch Gladbach , Germany ) according to manufacturer 's guidelines .

CD4 + T cells were isolated from cryopreserved healthy donor PBMCs by negative selection with the CD4 + T Cell Isolation Kit II ( Miltenyi Biotech , Bergisch Gladbach , Germany ) according to manufacturer 's guidelines .
Purity of negatively selected <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + T cells was consistently higher than 96 % as determined by flow cytometry .
Purity of negatively selected CD4 + T cells was consistently higher than 96 % as determined by flow cytometry .
